Sgt. Hammer.name: Spider Mines
Sgt. Hammer.description: Create 3 mines that deal 96 (+4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

Sgt. Hammer.name: Concussive Blast
Sgt. Hammer.description: Deals 141 (+4% per level) damage and pushes enemies away.

Sgt. Hammer.name: Siege Mode
Sgt. Hammer.description: Become immobile to increase Basic Attack range by 90%, deal 25% splash damage, and deal 30% bonus damage to Minions and Structures.

Sgt. Hammer.name: Napalm Strike
Sgt. Hammer.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

Sgt. Hammer.name: Blunt Force Gun
Sgt. Hammer.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to enemies in its path.

Sgt. Hammer.name: Artillery
Sgt. Hammer.description: Basic Attacks deal 30% more damage to distant enemies and Basic Attack range increased by 20%.

Sgt. Hammer.name: Thrusters
Sgt. Hammer.description: Increase your Movement Speed by 60% for 4 seconds.

1.name: Advanced Artillery
1.description: Increase the damage bonus to long distance enemies by 10%.

1.name: Resistant
1.description: Being Stunned or Rooted while in Siege Mode grants 50 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 50%.

1.name: Ambush
1.description: Stealth when entering Siege Mode. Your next Basic Attack from Siege Mode will deal 100% more damage. Lose Stealth when Basic Attacking, using an Ability, taking damage, or returning to Tank Mode.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30.  Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

4.name: Vigorous Assault
4.description: Basic Attacks heal for 15% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

4.name: Focused Attack
4.description: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Excessive Force
4.description: Double the knock back distance of Concussive Blast.

7.name: Mine Field
7.description: Increase the number of mines by 2.

7.name: Hyper-Cooling Engines
7.description: Reduce the cooldown of Thrusters by 15 seconds.

7.name: First Aid
7.description: Activate to heal 35% of your max Health over 6 seconds.

10.name: Blunt Force Gun
10.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to enemies in its path.

10.name: Napalm Strike
10.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: First Strike
13.description: Basic Attacks deal 25% more damage if you haven't been attacked within the last 5 seconds.

13.name: Bullhead Mines
13.description: Middle Spider Mine knocks target back a short distance.

13.name: Barricade
13.description: Create a wall of path blocking debris for 4 seconds.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Hover Siege Mode
16.description: You can move at 50% Movement Speed in Siege Mode.

16.name: Graduating Range
16.description: While in Siege Mode, Sgt. Hammer's Attack range increases by 1.1 every 3 seconds, up to 5.5.

16.name: Stoneskin
16.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

20.name: Orbital BFG
20.description: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

20.name: Advanced Lava Strike
20.description: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

20.name: Nexus Frenzy
20.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.
